text: João Orlando Duarte da Cunha (30 August 1939 - 14 November 2020) was a Brazilian politician. He was born in Ribeirão Preto, São Paulo. He was a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement. Cunha was known for being a political ally of President-elect Tancredo Neves. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1975 to 1991.João Cunha, deputado que 'elegeu' Tancredo, morre em Ribeirão Preto Cunha died on 14 November 2020 in Ribeirão Preto at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from São Paulo (state) Category:Brazilian Democratic Movement politicians Category:People from Ribeirão Preto
title: João Cunha
